author: Andrew 'Drew' Chigorimbo
description: Dry, lightly bitter and delicately spirituous. An aperitif-style sipper.
name: Smoky Mizu
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
20 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
